title: Where do i pay library fines?
content: Borrowed a book which no one will for the next 4 years (other than me again), return date was the next day and tried to renew it. Guy said i could keep it for a few more days with no problem. Returned the book today only for another guy to look at me as if i committed blasphemy for a fine of 4rs. I didnt want to deal with him so asking here.

comments.body: Pay it to the person sitting at the book return counter

>another guy to look at me as if i committed blasphemy

Lmao
